name: OverBombed
description:
It's a bombing!

Try to survive inside this frantic bunker in the middle of a war, while you have to keep the installations running to ensure your safety.

Tutorial:

Arrows: Walk

Space Key: Action -  hold it to duck and prevent yourself from falling when the bomb comes, or hold it to press the buttons to get tools to fix the machines and maximize your surviving time.  

Disclaimer: 

The game is still with some bugs but we're looking forward to fix them and futurely release as a full game!
